ch0071_09_otona/2701_0701_01_10:
Hey, will you listen to what I have to say? I just
have to tell someone. My dream of getting a drink
in the Pokémon Center came true!
ch0071_09_otona/2701_0701_02_10:
I got it with extra whipped cream! It’s a deluxe
creation from Trinnia herself!
ch0071_09_otona/2701_0701_03_10:
Just thinking about the fact that I can have this
every day now makes me feel faint
with excitement!
